mdex.errormsg.wrong_travelling_dimension:
You cannot go to the Mining Dimension from this dimension.
Go back to your home dimension and try accessing it from there.
mdex.teleportmanager.msg.teleport_schedu: Your teleportation request has been submitted. You can do other stuff until you will be actually teleported.
mdex.commands.errormsg.no_teleporting_sp:
No teleporting spawn data were found for the dimension of ID '%s'.
The dimension is possibly not tracked by the mod, or the data were not created yet.
mdex.commands.errormsg.getspdatacmdp.nod:
Player '%s' does not have teleporting data for dimension '%s'.
Possible causes:
-> The player does not have used the Mining Teleporter mechanism yet.
-> The data are misconstructed or malformed.
mdex.commands.msg.getspdatacmdp.success:
Exact spawn position for player '%s' for dimension '%s' is X = %d , Y = %d and Z = %d.
Command completed successfully.
mdex.commands.msg.getspdatacmd.list.head: Listing %d players (Spawn data for dimension '%s'):
mdex.commands.msg.getspdatacmd.list.entr: Player with UUID '%s' (%s) has spawn position X = %d , Y = %d and Z = %d.
mdex.commands.msg.setspdatacmd.success:
Successfully changed %s's teleporting position to X = %d , Y = %d and Z = %d.
Command completed successfully.
mdex.commands.msg.setspdatacmd.successan:
Successfully changed %s's teleporting position to X = %d , Y = %d and Z = %d. Old spawn position was: X = %d , Y = %d and Z = %d.
Command completed successfully.
mdex.commands.errormsg.teleportbymanager: Cannot execute this command overload from a server context. Use the more-specific command overload.
Cannot teleport to the same dimension by using the teleporting manager.
Cannot teleport to the specified dimension because an internal error occurred.
mdex.commands.errormsg.starterchestplace: Starter chests are not allowed in the dimension with ID '%s'.
mdex.commands.msg.getstarterchestplaceme: Starter chest for dimension '%s' is not placed yet.
A starter chest for the dimension '%s' has been placed.
mdex.commands.errormsg.getstarterchestpl: Mining Dimension Starter chests do not apply to the specified dimension.
